prodNameC: 美利迪恩輪狀病毒檢測系統 (未滅菌)
ingredientsDesc: 1.	48 Rotavirus Monoclonal Antibody coated microtiter wells,.2.	1 vial (6ml) Premier Rotaclone® Conjugate. Horse-radish peroxidase conjugated to anti-rotavirus monoclonal antibody in a buffered protein solution with gentamicin and 0.02% thimerosal as preservatives.3.	1 vial (2ml) Positive Control. Inactivated simian rotavirus SA-11 in buffered saline with 0.02% thimerosal as a preservative.4.	1 vial (50ml) Sample Diluent. Buffered saline with 0.02% thimerosal as preservative.5.	1 vial (6ml) Part A Substrate Buffer. Contains urea peroxide.6.	1 vial (6ml) Part B Substrate Solution. Contains tetramethylbenzidine (TMB).7.	1 vial (6ml) Stop Solution Contains 1N H2SO4.8.	48 sample transfer pipettes.9.	Microtiter well holder.
applicantAddr: 台北市信義區松德路７４號８樓
efficacy: 應用酵素免疫法，偵測存在於人類糞便中之輪狀病毒抗原。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.3405 小兒麻痺病毒血清試劑
